/usr/bin/c++   -fpic -O3 -std=c++11  -fopenmp    CMakeFiles/simpleAddCUDACXX.dir/main.cu.o CMakeFiles/simpleAddCUDACXX.dir/cmake_device_link.o  -o simpleAddCUDACXX  -L/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/stubs  -L/usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/6 libcpu.a libgpu.a -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
